actions.name: Queenly Majesty

cost.trigger: A creature (other than the user) uses a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] action.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature (other than the user) uses a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] action.
Effect: The triggering action fails and is @Affliction[disabled] 5.
